UnifiedVideoCallParticipant.name: UnifiedVideoCallParticipant
UnifiedVideoCallParticipant.description: Represents a participant in a video call.

ActivityId.description: ID of the video call the person is participating in.

ChannelAddress.description: The email address of the participant. The email address is captured at the time of the communication; it doesn’t change if the contact’s email address is updated later.

ListenRatio.description: Ratio of time the participant was listening versus talking in the video call.

ParticipantType.description: The participant’s role in the activity.

PersonId.description: ID of the person participating in the activity.

TalkRatio.description: Ratio of time the participant was talking versus listening in the video call.
